actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-811.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 7019) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7019 (Department of Transportation and related agencies, appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 7019) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1983, and for other purposes.
